data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Louie is a very talented aircraft mechanic. He ____ so ____ at ____ job ____ his ____ doesn't even ____ to ____ on ____ to ____ how he's ____. The ____ knows ____ if Louie ____ he ____ the ____, then ____ is ____. She wishes all of her mechanics were as diligent as Louie.
data.partBlankContent: Louie is a very talented aircraft mechanic. He i_ so go__ at h__ job th__ his man____ doesn't even ne__ to ch___ on h__ to s__ how he's do___. The man____ knows th__ if Louie sa__ he fi___ the pa__, then i_ is fi___. She wishes all of her mechanics were as diligent as Louie.
data.answer: 路易是个很有天赋的飞机机械师。他非常擅长自己的工作，他的经理甚至不需要检查他的表现。经理知道如果路易说他修好了那部分，那就修好了。她希望她所有的机械师都像路易一样勤奋。
